title: Calories in a Slice of Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in a slice cheese, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Slice of Cheese
assumptions: Processed American cheese slice, ~21 g, standard yellow variety, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cheese type, brand, slice thickness, and processing; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One slice of processed cheese provides ~70 kcal and ~4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use natural Swiss cheese slice (thicker, ~28 g)

faqs.q: How many calories in a slice of American cheese?
faqs.a: About 70 kcal for a standard 21 g processed slice.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in a slice cheese?
faqs.a: Typically 6 g total fat, including 3.5 g saturated, per slice.

faqs.q: Does cheese have carbs or fiber?
faqs.a: Minimal carbs (~1 g per slice) and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a slice of cheese?
faqs.a: Around 300 mg, which can vary by brand and type.

faqs.q: Are calories different for cheddar vs. processed cheese?
